body:
Silo currently depends on hdf5@:1.8.12 because it's HDF5's last version with MPI-POSIX IO support.
This PR patches Silo forcing it to use MPI-IO so it compiles on newer versions of HDF5.

The patch has been pulled from Debian and it works on all versions of Silo in Spack.
title: Silo: support newer versions of HDF5
